mapper.select: SELECT board_no, board_nm,board_content,board_in_date from ${db_table} ORDER BY board_no asc LIMIT #{start}, 10

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT `BOARD_NO`, `BOARD_CONTENT`, `BOARD_NM`, `BOARD_FILENO`, `BOARD_IN_DATE`, `BOARD_DEL_DATE`, `BOARD_MOD_DATE`, LEAD(BOARD_NO, 1) OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS NEXT_NO, LEAD(BOARD_NM, 1, '다음글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS NEXT_NM, LEAD(BOARD_IN_DATE, 1, null) OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS NEXT_DATE, LAG(BOARD_NO, 1) OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS PRE_NO, LAG(BOARD_NM, 1, '이전글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS PRE_NM, LAG(BOARD_IN_DATE, 1, null) OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS PRE_DATE FROM ${db_table} ) A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = ${board_No};
